title: Defective Product
complaint_description: Product is not functioning as expected: cracked screen.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Escalate to technical team and keep customer informed every 24 hours until resolved.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #5678. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
